scripts.say: If you've come this far, that can only mean one thing... I hate to admit it, but you might be just a little different from those we've fought so far.
But we've never fought anyone that could escape from our mighty guns. You are no exception!
I collected a lot of data during our last battle. This time our chances of winning are over 90%.
Listen up, you fools standing before the Shark Sisters! This is where our hunt begins! And don't you dare disappoint me!
Scharnhorst-class battlecruisers Scharnhorst and Gneisenau, ready for battle! Come and face your doom!
